dcterms:creator: Ankush Khandelwal
Sahil Swami
Syed S Akhtar
Manish Shrivastava
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset containing 3543 annotated tweets where 1755 are labeled humorous and 1698 as non-humorous, used for evaluating the effectiveness of bilingual word embeddings and proposed deep learning models for humor detection.
dcterms:title: Benchmark dataset for humor detection
